# UIButton.Configuration.Indicator.none

**Case**

A constant that doesn’t show an indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Indicator styles

- **UIButton.Configuration.Indicator.automatic**: A constant that automatically determines an indicator style according to the button’s properties.
- **UIButton.Configuration.Indicator.popup**: A constant that shows a popup-style indicator.
